h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Back at the top of the stairs to the second level, head along the outside path to the right this time. The first open cell as you head this direction will have a green Wisp to absorb to replenish some of your gourd's healing charges.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Back at the top of the stairs to the second level, head along the outside path to the right this time. The first open cell as you head this direction will have a green Wisp to absorb to replenish some of your gourd's healing charges.
